section.p: You are welcomed in the Hall of Heroes as the one who slew Grindel the Ripper. You are asked repeatedly to tell the tale of your adventures, and make about during the telling. Bylewyn Buskle, the innkeeper, treats you frostily for some reason.

You can stay here as long as you like. The tavern costs you 2 Shards a day. Each day you spend here, you can recover 1 Stamina point if injured, up to the limit of your normal unwounded Stamina score.
When you are ready, you leave the Hall of Heroes. .
